bug.author: gvashishtha
bug.summary: Broken link in PyTorch mnist notebook
bug.description: Configuration link under Prerequisites appears to be broken in [this notebook](<denchmark-link:https://github.com/Azure/MachineLearningNotebooks/blob/master/how-to-use-azureml/ml-frameworks/pytorch/training/distributed-pytorch-with-horovod/distributed-pytorch-with-horovod.ipynb%5D(https://github.com/Azure/MachineLearningNotebooks/blob/master/how-to-use-azureml/ml-frameworks/pytorch/training/distributed-pytorch-with-horovod/distributed-pytorch-with-horovod.ipynb)>https://github.com/Azure/MachineLearningNotebooks/blob/master/how-to-use-azureml/ml-frameworks/pytorch/training/distributed-pytorch-with-horovod/distributed-pytorch-with-horovod.ipynb](https://github.com/Azure/MachineLearningNotebooks/blob/master/how-to-use-azureml/ml-frameworks/pytorch/training/distributed-pytorch-with-horovod/distributed-pytorch-with-horovod.ipynb)</denchmark-link>

<denchmark-link:https://github.com/gvashishtha>@gvashishtha</denchmark-link> Hi Gopal, this link works for me well. Could you please try again? Thanks!

Yep, still broken. Try going to <denchmark-link:https://render.githubusercontent.com/configuration.ipynb>https://render.githubusercontent.com/configuration.ipynb</denchmark-link> , and it will not work. <denchmark-link:https://github.com/Azure/MachineLearningNotebooks/blob/master/how-to-use-azureml/ml-frameworks/pytorch/training/distributed-pytorch-with-horovod/distributed-pytorch-with-horovod.ipynb?short_path=f711b27#L32>This line</denchmark-link> is the issue
<denchmark-link:https://github.com/vizhur>@vizhur</denchmark-link> Hi, could you please help fix this repo? Thanks.

<denchmark-link:https://github.com/YutongTie-MSFT>@YutongTie-MSFT</denchmark-link> please assign to notebook author. The impacted notebooks use a path like ../../../configuration.ipynb but the location of the notebook is too deep and the link doesnâ€™t resolve. This happens in particular with ml-frameworks notebooks which are deeply nested like the notebook in the issue.
sample is moved/renamed closing the isse
